abstract: The Cardinals and the Texas Rangers are riding thunderous offenses into the 107th World Series, which starts Wednesday at Busch Stadium in St. Louis.
snippet: The Cardinals and the Texas Rangers are riding thunderous offenses into the 107th World Series, which starts Wednesday at Busch Stadium in St. Louis.

headline.main: Offenses Point to High-Scoring World Series
headline.print_headline: The Potential for Scoring Not Seen in Nearly 80 Years
